unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for building a strong talent pipeline, especially from institutions like IIT Delhi. We at ABC Corp. are excited for our upcoming drive on 26/01/2024. We aim to onboard fresh graduates by 01/07/2024. Please register before 17:00 hrs on 15/12/2023. It's a great opportunity, like landing a role after a competitive CAT exam! Good luck, candidates! We offer Rs. 5 LPA starting.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for building a strong talent pipeline, especially from institutions like I I T Delhi. We at A B C Corp. are excited for our upcoming drive on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four. We aim to onboard fresh graduates by first July two thousand and twenty four. Please register before seventeen hundred hours on fifteenth December two thousand and twenty three. It's a great opportunity, like landing a role after a competitive C A T exam! Good luck, candidates! We offer rupees five L P A starting.
